title: Technology-Enhanced Instructional Design for Improving Acceptance of Educational Social Robots

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT literacy and fundamental understanding of integrating educational technology
context.additional_context: Experiencing educational applications of social robots through a blended approach combining online platforms and offline practical sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can apply an analytical framework to evaluate social robots' social functions and educational applicability
Learners can design assessment tools to predict educational robots' usage intentions based on the Unified Theory of Acceptance and Use of Technology (UTAUT)
Learners can identify cognitive resistance factors in human-robot interactions and propose mitigation strategies

resources: Educational Social Robot Prototype Rental Service

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
